These events remind us that a focus on diversity, equity, and inclusion is essential to ensure that all people are treated with respect, kindness, and dignity. As a community, we all need to identify and correct any implicit biases and work to disrupt and dismantle systems that create inequity. Together we can create a kinder world.

Bulldog Strong,
Yolanda Brunt

Dear Parents/Guardians,

Covert Public Schools will provide nutritious breakfast and lunches from March 18th through April 5th. Transportation will use their normal bus routes to drop off food for students. This service is FREE of charge.

Delivery dates will be on the next three Wednesdays between 9:30AM and 11:30AM:

March 18th
March 25th
April 1st

Wednesday’s drop off includes breakfast and lunch for one week (7 days). For students who walk to school, there will be a bus parked in the Covert library parking lot. Parents or students can pick up food on the indicated dates/times as well.

These meals will be in “Grab-N-Go” bags/containers. If you are not home when the delivery is made, you may pick up the food on the delivery days listed above by the main entrance of the school from 12:30 PM - 2:00 PM.

Thank you to our staff, families, board of education and community for your commitment to ensuring our students are provided with nutritious meals during this time.

Stay Safe and Stay Healthy, Bulldog Strong!

Yolanda Brunt, Superintendent
Covert Public Schools
